attribute.description: listen address for snmpGet operations, default = 0.0.0.0
attribute.name: listeningIpv4

attribute.description: listening port for snmpGet operations, default = 161
attribute.name: listeningPort

attribute.description: specifies the snmp version type=str, choices=['2c', '3']
attribute.name: version

attribute.description: holds the v2c community, only used for v2c, default = ''
attribute.name: community

attribute.description: holds the authentication, empty autentication is not used
attribute.name: authKey

attribute.description: holds the authentication protocol, optional (MD5|SHA), default = SHA
attribute.name: authProtocol

attribute.description: holds the encryption key, empty encryption is not used
attribute.name: authKey

attribute.description: holds the encryption protocol, optional, (DES|AES) default = AES
attribute.name: authProtocol

attribute.description: string Identifier of oid, e.g. sysLocation
attribute.name: oidName

attribute.description: value of the oid, e.f. contact@example.com
attribute.name: valueAsString

attribute.description: string Identifier of oid, e.g. sysLocation
attribute.name: snmpIpv4TrapTarget

attribute.description: value of the oid, e.f. contact@example.com
attribute.name: snmpTrapPort
